comment.author: 23269353@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Martinliners! (Martin 2-0-2 and 4-0-4), and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 38254353@N05
comment._content: This window actually still exists...If one walks past the escalators on the first floor of the terminal towards the Capitol Region Airport Commission's office, you can see it just past their boardroom.  There' s nothing to see out the window though.  The breezeway to the new section of the airport goes right through the upper part of the window, and the concourses block your view of the airfield.

comment.author: 48642275@N00
comment._content: Exactly... the window is still there and it seems like they just encased the old airport with all the new additions.  The old terminal was taller I believe, so maybe they just removed a couple of floors?
